privacy_intro_text: F1 RACING eINK API ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website. As an open-source project designed for the self-hosting community, we prioritize transparency and data minimization.
privacy_data_text: We collect minimal data necessary for operation:
privacy_data_usage: Usage Data: We may use privacy-friendly analytics (like Umami) to understand traffic without tracking individuals.
privacy_data_errors: Error Tracking: We use GlitchTip to monitor stability and debug errors. This collects anonymous error stack traces and device info (OS, Browser) when a crash occurs. This data is anonymized where possible and used solely for fixing bugs.
privacy_data_local: Local Storage: Preferences (such as language selection) are saved locally in your browser and never leave your device.
privacy_thirdparty_text: Our service may link to third-party websites (e.g., GitHub, Coolify). We possess no control over or responsibility for third-party content or privacy practices.
privacy_gdpr_text: If you are a resident of the EEA, you have certain data protection rights. As no user accounts or personal data are stored server-side (apart from technical logs), "Right to Erasure" and "Right to Portability" are generally not applicable. Contact us via GitHub if you have concerns.
privacy_opensource_text: Our project is open-source under the MIT License. Review the codebase on GitHub for full transparency.
privacy_contact_text: For privacy concerns, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.
api_docs_intro: Generate 800×480 1-bit BMP images for E-Ink displays showing F1 race schedules.
api_docs_eink_desc: Fetch /calendar.bmp and display directly on your E-Ink display. Recommended refresh interval: every 1-6 hours. Compatible with any 800×480 E-Ink display (e.g., Waveshare 7.5", LaskaKit).
stats_footer: Data refreshes on page load. Select a time range above.
meta_description_home: Free F1 race calendar for your E-Ink display. Get upcoming race times, circuit info, and historical results optimized for 800x480 e-paper screens.
meta_description_api: API documentation for F1 E-Ink Calendar. Generate 800x480 1-bit BMP images for E-Ink displays showing F1 race schedules.
meta_description_privacy: Privacy policy for F1 E-Ink Calendar. Learn how we handle your data with transparency and minimal collection.
meta_description_stats: Usage statistics for F1 E-Ink Calendar API. View request counts, response times, and endpoint metrics.
meta_keywords: F1, Formula 1, E-Ink, calendar, race schedule, ESP32, LaskaKit, e-paper display, zivyobraz
